overview:
Néstor has been a Financial Advisor and Partner at wiseri.com since its inception in 2010 and has a special interest in management control systems and above all in developing business plans for tech start-ups and then presenting them to future investors.

He has had wide ranging experience in the banking sector and has worked in a variety of different departments which has given him in-depth knowledge of financial products and of the different ways of financing businesses.

Nestor has had a large variety of posts in his sector, starting out working in operations for Barclays Bank after graduating from the Complutense University of Madrid with a degree in Economics. Shortly afterwards he embarked on an MBA at IDE CESEM Business School which led him to the post of Controller at the independent law firm Uría Menéndez, where he was involved in the review and analysis of financial statements, the creation of the anual budget and forecasts and the establishment and implementation of short- and long term departmental goals, policies and operational procedures.

Alongside his work with wiseri.com, since 2010 Nestor has been a Financial Advisor at Freelance where he conducts financial assessments of tech start-ups before presenting them to potential investors.
